AVEVA Group plc

Director/PDMR Shareholding

 

AVEVA Group plc announces that on 24 February 2021 it was notified of the following share option exercise and sale of shares which took place:

Craig Hayman, Chief Executive Officer

On 22 February 2021 Mr Hayman exercised options over 234,202 shares under the AVEVA Group Long Term Incentive Plan and retained all resulting shares.

 

Following this, on 24 February 2021 Mr Hayman sold 32,000 shares at a price of £35.51 per share to settle tax obligations.
